reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, well-made, and comfortable, noting it doesn't irritate the skin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best online purchase I‚Äôve made!
items.body: I love this!! It is very roomy, super soft and extremely comfortable. Not heavy material, so not hot to wear. I‚Äôm ordering another one. I normally wear Medium/large depending on the shirt. I ordered a Medium and it is VERY roomy. I‚Äôm wondering if I could even get a small? ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I guess it depends on how roomy you want it. Glad to finally order something online that fits and looks good! Read more
items.author: Susie Whitacre

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prefect fit
items.body: I am 5‚Äô7‚Äù, 145, DD. The medium fits perfect. I have long arms and the sleeves come right where my hand meets my wrist. The medium is somewhat oversized on me. I will be ordering a large in a different color for the super oversized fits. Very comfy, sturdy, no smell. 10/10 recommend Read more
items.author: Jennifer Collelo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Honestly shocked at how much I like this sweater. I got one in black and one in the bright blue. They are both soft and very comfortable to wear. Length is perfect. Read more
items.author: Jessica L. Mainer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: Cute sweater. Very soft, and the neck doesn't strangle me. I usually can't wear a turtleneck for that reason but this one is fine. Bought a medium and it fit great. Just bought another color! Read more
items.author: Susan Robinson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it . Quality nice, warm and looks great.
items.body: Love it . It‚Äôs big and warm and looks way better on than in picture . Will be ordering another color . Read more
items.author: Barbara Adamski

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars EFAN vs. Lillusory brand of this sweater
items.body: Let me start first by saying I love this sweater! I now own 4 of them in various colors. At least 2 vendors are selling them on Amazon and I have purchased from both. Here are my comparisons: PRICE They are competitive, although the EFAN one was slightly cheaper on my most recent purchase. They go on deep discount sometimes too. SIZING Sizes are commensurate with each other. However, one EFAN that I purchased had one shoulder and sleeve cut longer than the other shoulder and I‚Äôm debating returning it. It would be a snap decision if I didn‚Äôt buy the last kelly green one either has in any size. FABRIC Fabrics are identical. 50% viscose, 30% polyamide, 20% polyester. I have trouble with turtlenecks that over a day scrape up my chin and leave it feeling raw. This sweater is so soft that I never have that problem with it. That‚Äôs one reason I now own 4. FIT Fit can vary in the same brand. One may be slightly longer or slightly larger. That‚Äôs kinda to be expected for the price and they‚Äôre easy to return and order again in same size for a shot at a better fit. STYLE I love the look of the vertical line down the front of this sweater. The ones from EFAN accomplish this vertical line using a change in the stitching. The Lillusory version accomplishes the vertical line by pressing it either with heat or folding (and vacuum sealing). So, I won‚Äôt be surprised if the vertical line disappears on the Lillusory version the first time I wash it. I would return it for the EFAN version, if EFAN hadn‚Äôt been sold out in wine for ages and Lillusory‚Äôs wine color is gorgeous. PACKAGING The EFAN sweaters are packaged in a loose plastic bag, so they look great straight out of the Amazon box. The Lillusory ones are vacuum sealed and have some fairly permanent looking creases. Both brands of the sweater have a thick ribbed neck and the vacuum seal on the Lillusory sealed the ribbed neck perpendicular to the ribbed front of the sweater. The result is below the turtleneck and above my cleavage, the Lillusory now looks crosshatched (see picture). I expect it will disappear when I wash it the first time. BOTTOM LINE: BUY! Buy the sweater. It‚Äôs gorgeous, comfy and generally true to size. You‚Äôre gonna love it and want it in more colors. Buy it from the vendor who has the color, size, and price that best suits you. But if both vendors have your preferred color and size in stock, go with EFAN‚Äôs version for the vertical stitching down the front and the loose packaging that doesn‚Äôt dent the ribbed knit. Read more
items.author: Tea Drinker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Material is light
items.body: Love this sweater. Med fits perfect. The color is more muted than bright which is fine for me. This will need ironing or steaming after washing. Hung to dry did not shrink. Material is lighter than I though but still nice. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable
items.body: This is a really comfortable sweater. Not to thick. Not itchy. Fits well. The neck is loose and comfortable. Soft material. Read more
items.author: Kym G

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Nutmeg, Light Apricot, Apricot, Opal, Army Green, Black, Orange, Brick Red, Deep Grey, Mauve Rose, Lake Blue, Light Pink, Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
